column4: hey all, have a question about the nvidia kernel: when I reboot the PC it doesnt get initialized so GDM doesn't start, when I insert it myself it works though...any ideas?
well, you need to reboot to test it, but it's not required...
you might be able to disable it with /sys
I'm not sure, I'm looking at google
thanks, trying the same but that ipv6 makes the whole resolving slow like hell...very annoying
and you ran update-modules.modutils? and checked to make sure it showed up in /etc/modules.conf?
yup, it's there and I rebooted..
